title: Veterinary Clinical Simulation-Based Goal-Oriented Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational veterinary theory and knowledge of animal anatomy
context.additional_context: Goal-based learning conducted in a VR environment replicating real clinical scenarios.

learning_goals: Learners can perform trauma patient diagnostic protocols for dogs with 90% accuracy in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can accurately classify fracture types with over 85% precision through radiographic image analysis in virtual clinical cases.
Learners can apply suturing techniques at or above ANSI/IVTA Standard Level 3 in simulation-based surgical training.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
